message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.GR 

The paper deals with computer vision and image segmentation, which are core topics in computer science. The paper proposes a novel method for mirror segmentation, which falls under the computer vision subfield. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The proposed method involves the use of a neural network, which is a machine learning algorithm, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. The paper also deals with image processing and analysis, which falls under the multimedia subfield (cs.MM). Finally, the paper involves the segmentation of objects in images, which is a common problem in computer graphics (cs.GR).
